formulas.formula_english: Work done by a force at an angle.
Kinetic energy of a moving body.
Elastic potential energy stored in a spring.
Conservation of mechanical energy (no non-conservative forces).
Mechanical energy with non-conservative work included.
variants: W_{nc} often represents work done by friction or air resistance

formulas.formula_english: Power is the rate of doing work.
Instantaneous power for a constant force and velocity.
similar: Useful when force is applied in direction of motion
